cast.overview: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins due to the efforts of the Mad Titan, Thanos. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers must assemble once more in order to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe once and for all, no matter what consequences may be in store.
cast.title: Avengers: Endgame

details.biography: Lexi Rabe  (born June 15, 2012) is an American child actress. This dynamic little eight year old mesmerizes everyone she meets. Heading into first grade she lives a normal life, church, chores, public school, playing with friends but every couple months she takes off a couple weeks or after school and makes a movie. Miss Lexie loves bugs, playing in water and being a princess. She is very outgoing and makes friends where ever she goes, with every age, color, and creed. Lexie loves animals and brings home any stray she can sneak into the house.
details.name: Lexi Rabe
